si.t: Only for AppendToSection (section to import into)
Text | Textarea | SingleChoice | MultiChoice | Likert | Radio | Checkbox | Dropdown
Which from bellow is the prime number?
CreateTemplate (new) | AppendToTemplate (add/update within existing template) | AppendToSection (add/update questions/options inside a specific section order)
This import supports ONE template per uploaded file. Donâ€™t mix different TemplateName/TemplateType examples in the Import sheet.
Set option Score. For MultiChoice, IsCorrect should be TRUE on correct options (used for max-score calculation).
Likert requires TraitKey + Ws on the question, and Wa on options. Candidate personality score is derived from WaSum grouped by TraitKey.
Do NOT add Name/Version columns. The backend generates stable names and manages versioning. Orders identify sections/questions/options for import matching.

You can fill Scope/TemplateName/TemplateType/Title/Description only on the first data row and leave them blank on subsequent rows. For option-based questions, you can also leave Section/Question fields blank on the next rows (the backend carries forward the previous row values).
TimeLimitSeconds is not used at the moment, so it has been removed from this template.
